core

Interface CentralServerListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CentralServerAdapter

    public interface CentralServerListener
extends java.util.EventListener
    The listener interface for receiving the events from the central server. A central server event is generated when a request is received or when a response is sent.
    Author:
    Paul Chaignon

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onBestMoveSent(java.lang.String bestMove)
      Called when a response has been sent after a Get Best Move request.
      void onDebugInformationSent(java.lang.String debug)
      Called when a response has been sent after a debug request.
      void onDebugRequest(java.lang.String fen)
      Called when a debug request has been received.
      void onEndOfGameRequest(int gameId, java.lang.String fen)
      Called when a End of Game request has been received.
      void onGameIdSent(int gameId)
      Called when a response has been sent after a Start Game request.
      void onGetBestMoveRequest(int gameId, java.lang.String fen)
      Called when a Get Best Move request has been received.
      void onStartGameRequest(boolean san)
      Called when a Start Game request has been received.

    • Method Detail

      • onDebugRequest

        void onDebugRequest(java.lang.String fen)
        Called when a debug request has been received.
        Parameters:
        fen - The FEN received.

      • onStartGameRequest

        void onStartGameRequest(boolean san)
        Called when a Start Game request has been received.
        Parameters:
        san - True if the client want to receive SAN moves.

      • onEndOfGameRequest

        void onEndOfGameRequest(int gameId,
                      java.lang.String fen)
        Called when a End of Game request has been received.
        Parameters:
        gameId - The id of the game in question.
        fen - The FEN received.

      • onGetBestMoveRequest

        void onGetBestMoveRequest(int gameId,
                        java.lang.String fen)
        Called when a Get Best Move request has been received. Concerns the Get Best Move requests within a game or without.
        Parameters:
        gameId - The id of the game in question.
        fen - The FEN received.

      • onBestMoveSent

        void onBestMoveSent(java.lang.String bestMove)
        Called when a response has been sent after a Get Best Move request.
        Parameters:
        bestMove - The best move sent.

      • onDebugInformationSent

        void onDebugInformationSent(java.lang.String debug)
        Called when a response has been sent after a debug request.
        Parameters:
        debug - The debug information sent as an HTML document.

      • onGameIdSent

        void onGameIdSent(int gameId)
        Called when a response has been sent after a Start Game request.
        Parameters:
        gameId - The game id sent.
